Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared

Contains classes related to the more common data structures used in the framework's modules.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Link A link connects two Linkable objects.
Linkable A object that can have links attached to it.
LinkCategory Specifies the category of a Link
Node Node represents a Concept in LIDA.
NodeStructure A NodeStructure holds a collection of Nodes an Links.
 

Class Summary
ConcurrentHashSet<E> Thread-safe HashSet based on a ConcurrentHashMap
ConcurrentHashSetTest  
DefaultElementFactoryTest  
ElementFactory Standard factory for the basic elements of the framework.
ElementFactoryTest  
ExtendedId Generalized Id for Both Nodes and Links.
ExtendedIdTest If you are really bored then you can test the case where the sinks link's sink is a link between 2 nodes I've just tested up to the case where the sink's link is just between 2 nodes and that should be sufficient because it tests the same code (the link constructor) just with different values in the sink ExtendedId
LinkImpl A Link that connects a Node to a Linkable (Node or Link).
LinkImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the LinkImpl class
NodeImpl Default Node Implementation WARNING: Renaming this class requires renaming values in configs/factoriesData.xml
NodeImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the NodeImpl class
NodeStructureConcurrencyTest  
NodeStructureImpl Default implementation of NodeStructure.
NodeStructureImplTest This is a JUnit class which can be used to test methods of the NodeStructureImpl class
TestBigNs  
UnmodifiableNodeStructureImpl An immutable NodeStructureImpl.
UnmodifiableNodeStructureImplTest  
 

Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared Description

Contains classes related to the more common data structures used in the framework's modules.
